title: Hi, I'm Marta! I'm designer.
text:
I started my professional career as a graphic designer for an advertising agency. Throughout my career I have expanded my skillset, and now, I am a designer in visual communications. My specialities include customer guidance system design in navigating customer experiences in a furniture store.

In the near future, I want to further my career and expand as a UX/UI designer.

My approach to design is balanced, making sure there is unity and expression in beauty, simplicity and usability. I have a strong passion for creating user centric designed solutions, while making sure to keep a healthy work-life balance.

To see what I am up to, feel free to get in touch or see my latest projects!
